page.title: 08SUPERNATURAL EVENTS
page.content: THIS WENT ON FOR JUST A FEW MOMENTS. ON ANOTHER OCCASION MRS RATTON WAS BEHIND THE BAR WATCHING THE SUCURITY TV SCREEN WHEN A MAN AGED AS SHE WATCHED. SHE WENT DOWN TO WHERE HE HAD BEEN AND THE AIR WAS {RED HOT. ON ANOTHER OCCASION FIVE PEOPLE, INCLUDING MRS RATTON, WERE IN THE LOUNGE WHEN THE CURTAINS OPENED AND A STRANGE MIST ROLLED IN. AT THIS, EVERYBODY RAN OUT OF THE LOUNGE BAR. ON THE LAST OCCASION MRS RATTON WAS TALKING TO A FRIEND, THE FRIEND TURNED AWAY. WHEN SHE LOOKED BACK HALF HER FACE WAS HERS AND HALF WAS A STRANGER'S.
